caseBed.description: (string) bed file containing good coverage positions from case vcf files where 90% samples have coverage >= 10

caseSample.description: (string) one column text file containing list of samples, one sample name per line

caseVCFFileList.description: (string) one column text file containing list of vcf file paths, one vcf file per line

gnomADVersion.description: (string) gnomAD version, available options are v2exome, v4exome, v4genome

caseAnnotatedVCFPrefix.description: (string) prefix of case annotation vcf files before the chromosome number

caseAnnotatedVCFSuffix.description: (string) suffix of case annotation vcf files after the chromosome number

casePopulation.description: (string) file containing estimation of the population/ethnicity of case samples using gnomAD classifier, optional, if not specified nextflow app will estimate the population using gnomAD classifier

pLDControl.description: (number) the pvalue threshold to detect high LD variants in control

REVELThreshold.description: (number) the minimum REVEL score for pathogenic missense variants

variantInclude.description: (string) a one column file specifying the variants to be included, it will also include variants specified in variantExcludeFile

ACANConfig.description: (string) a file specifying the AC AN info ID and optional stratified ID for cases

AFMax.description: (number) the maximum of the alternate alleles frequency

variantMissing.description: (number) the maximum missingness allowed for a variant

variantGroup.description: (string) a specified variant group to use for test or a self defined function to define the variants of interest, see the function CoCoRV for more details

groupFunctionConfig.description: (string) an optional R file with functions or a tab separated two column text file defining the variants of interest, see README for examples

extraParamJason.description: (string) an optional JASON file to provide extra parameters to the custuomized file variantGroupCustom

annotationUsed.description: (string) a one column file without the header listing all required annotations used in variant filtering. AC AN annotations from ACANConfig will be added automatically

addVEP.description: (string) if VEP annotation will be used

cpus.description: (number) number of cpus for gds conversion module

topK.description: top K genes for generating variant list

caseControl.description: cae or control for which top K genes need to be examined
